name: Dangerous
blurb: Dangerous is an exciting multiplayer 2D platforming shooter where quick reflexes and sharp wits are your key to survival.

rewards.reward: Gracious Backer --- \r\nLooking for a quick and easy way to support Dangerous and get some recognition? You won't find a better offer anywhere on the internet! $5 gets you a virtual high-five and thank you credit in the game and on our website.

Supporter --- Combine that virtual high-five and thank you credit, with a nice digital copy of the game on XBOX plus the ability to listen to the sultry tunes of Dangerous from anywhere with a digital download of the Dangerous Original Soundtrack. Nothing says thank you like a verification code for a new game!

Digital Friend --- Read about the secret world of Dangerous in our digital PDF Concept Art book. Full to the brim with concept art from all stages of development as well as commentary about the development process of an Indie Studio.

The Coder Gamer --- All of the fun stuff listed above, plus some real world items! Stare at your new signed thank you card sitting on your desk. And don't forget about the special Kickstarter Supporter ONLY in-game item. You'll be the talk of the town with in-game swag! (In-game item will not impact game balance). This is the category to choose if you think The Code is what makes the game!

The Artist Gamer --- All of the fun stuff listed above, plus some real world items! Stare at your new signed thank you card sitting on your desk. And don't forget about the special Kickstarter Supporter ONLY in-game item. You'll be the talk of the town with in-game swag! (In-game item will not impact game balance). Choose this category to throw your support behind the Art Team!
The Art Lover --- All the rewards up to this point and you can still keep supporting Dangerous while grabbing a signed poster and a 5"x7" concept art print, already matted. Hang 'em with pride!

The Art ---\r\nShow your pride for the art team of Dangerous and receive a digital print sketch art piece from one of our artists. Or if programming is more your angle, support The Programmer and show those artists whose boss. Throw in the printed Concept Art Book and you'll be an art connoisseur before you know it. Everything above is included as well of course.

The Code ---\r\nYou can't let those artists have all the glory. Would you prefer to back a programmer instead? This is your chance to represent the more code-friendly of us. You'll still get the digital print concept sketch art piece, only this time, it'll be drawn by a programmer! Beware, I'm not sure our programmers have touched a pencil since grade school. Of course, you can always buffer out the sketch art craziness with something actually containing Art (with a capital A), our printed Concept Art Book. Everything above is included as well of course.

The Package --- It's about that time. This tier nets you everything already listed, as well as a physical copy of the Dangerous Original Sound Track on CD, A behind the scenes DVD, and the exclusive Kickstarter Supporter Dangerous Graphic Novel. This limited edition graphic novel will delve into the trials of those involved in the hunt.

The Big Case --- You've made it this far, and you deserve something special. Supporting this tier will take everything listed above, and add a special Collectors Tin with a special surprise, and free DLC for Dangerous forever. What is this surprise you might ask? Lets just say 3D printing might be involved... or not, it's a surprise.

Artist Aficionado --- The Artist Returns! Same drill as the $100 levels, except this time you will receive a unique hand-drawn art sketch piece from one of our artists. These are one-of-a-kind art pieces that you'll be sure to treasure. And as always, everything else above is included. (art pieces will not exceed 5"x7")

Coder Aficionado --- The Programmer part Deux! A hand drawn piece of art from one of our programmers. What more could you possibly want? These are one of kind, and unique to say the least. As always, all the other rewards listed above are also included. (Art pieces will not exceed 5"x7")

The Avatar --- The Avatar level supporter will get something truly special. As a recognition of your support, we will include a character or feature in the game based off of your suggestions. This can include many forms, and the development team will work with you to figure out the best way to incorporate your desire into the game. That awesome opportunity will be yours plus all of the other fabulous rewards listed above. (Multivarious Games reserves the ultimate right to approve and design suggestions)

The Executive --- Support of this level is where it's at. You'll get all the great rewards up to this point, plus executive producer credit for the game, and lastly, an invitation to the Dangerous Launch Party. You'll be one of only a few individuals who will get to party with the MVG team as we prepare to launch the game. Drinks and food will be provided for the event so you can kick-back, play, and hangout with the team (airfare and hoteling not included)
